data.name: General
data.description: Conferences covering a wide range of web development and software engineering topics.

relatedRecords.name: Code Workshop Halloween Party 2019
relatedRecords.description: Join us for our annual Halloween party when the spirits come out to code. Costumes not required, but always appreciated. Celebrate with lightning talks, a Halloweenn hackathon with great prizes, and Open Source Trick-or-Treat goodies and awesome food.

relatedRecords.name: Future Developer Summit 2019
relatedRecords.description: An invite-only, Director-level network where the developer marketing leaders debate best practices, learn and design better developer strategies. The event brings together 60 Director/VP/GM-level thought leaders in developer marketing to share experiences.

relatedRecords.name: Gulf Coast Code Camp 2020
relatedRecords.location: Shelby Hall, University of South Alabama
relatedRecords.description: Mobile is hosting a Code Camp at the University of South Alabama on August 8th 2020! This is a FREE, one day event with 16 speakers!
